scripts.backup: npm run backup-development && npm run backup-staging && npm run backup-main && npm run backup-alternative
scripts.copy:main-to-staging: npm run backup:main && npm run backup:staging && npm run import:main-to-staging -- --replace
scripts.copy:main-to-alternative: npm run backup:main && npm run backup:alternative && npm run import:main-to-alternative -- --replace
scripts.copy:main-to-development: npm run backup:main && npm run backup:development && npm run import:main-to-development -- --replace
scripts.copy:staging-to-development: npm run backup:staging && npm run backup:development && npm run import:staging-to-development -- --replace
scripts.copy:staging-to-main: npm run backup:staging && npm run backup:main && npm run import:staging-to-main -- --replace
scripts.copy:staging-to-alternative: npm run backup:staging && npm run backup:alternative && npm run import:staging-to-alternative -- --replace
scripts.copy:development-to-staging: npm run backup:development && npm run backup:staging && npm run import:development-to-staging -- --replace
scripts.copy:downstream: npm run backup:main && npm run backup:staging && npm run backup:development && npm run import:main-to-staging -- --replace && npm run import:main-to-development -- --replace
